description: This Java class `AttributeReportEvent` models a specific event related to attribute reports in a Zigbee-like protocol, providing fields and methods to handle event data such as EUI64 identifier, cluster and attribute IDs, payload, and manufacturer-specific information.

classes.name: AttributeReportEvent
classes.description: A class representing an attribute report event in Zigbee, inheriting from `Event`, encapsulating details like EUI64, cluster ID, attribute ID, payload, and manufacturer info.

methods.name: AttributeReportEvent
methods.description: Constructor initializing an event with basic attribute information.

methods.name: AttributeReportEvent
methods.description: Constructor initializing an event with attribute information and manufacturer code, setting the device as manufacturer-specific if code != 0.

methods.name: getEui64
methods.description: Returns the EUI64 identifier associated with the event.

methods.name: getSourceEndpoint
methods.description: Returns the source endpoint ID where the event originated.

methods.name: getClusterId
methods.description: Returns the cluster ID associated with the event.

methods.name: getEncodedBuf
methods.description: Returns the payload encoded as a Base64 string, including attribute ID and type.

methods.name: getRssi
methods.description: Returns a fixed RSSI value of -50.

methods.name: getLqi
methods.description: Returns a fixed LQI value of 255.

methods.name: getMfgCode
methods.description: Returns the manufacturer code if present.

methods.name: isMfgSpecific
methods.description: Returns whether the event is manufacturer-specific.
